hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.ServerConnection

  • public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an ServerSocket for accepting new connections on a specific port.
    Author:
    Marco Egger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerConnection(int port)
      Create a socket on port.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeServer()
      Closes the ServerSocket.
      java.net.Socket listenSocket()
      Waits until a new connection is established, then returns the new socket.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerConnection

        public ServerConnection(int port)
        Create a socket on port.
        Parameters:
        port - to listen on

    • Method Detail

      • listenSocket

        public java.net.Socket listenSocket()
        Waits until a new connection is established, then returns the new socket.
        To read and write the Socket provides two functions, getOutputStream() and getInputStream(), which should be casted to an ObjectOutputStream or ObjectInputStream.
        Returns:
        Socket the socket

      • closeServer

        public void closeServer()
        Closes the ServerSocket. Should be called when terminating the software or no new connection should be accepted.
